weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You don't want me on your head!

weather.question: I am yellow and hot, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. What am I?
I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ☃️ You can build a snowman with me
🧣 You wear a scarf to keep warm when I'm around

weather.question: I am strong and I blow the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 You can feel me on your face.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I appear after the rain stops.
🎨 It is said there is gold at the end of me.

weather.question: I am very loud and bright. I come with thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ You often see me during a storm.
💥 I make a loud noise after I flash.

weather.question: I am the sound that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ You cover your ears when I happen
😳 Some people are scared of me

weather.question: Sometimes it rains and the sun is shining, so I can appear. I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I need both sun and rain to appear.
✨ I am a beautiful sight to see!

weather.question: I can be big or small. I am made of ice and can damage things in a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am a frozen ball from the sky.
🌧️ I fall from the sky like rain.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I might be red or black. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I can fly and I love flowers. I make honey. What am I?
I have colorful wings and I fly around gardens. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 My wings have many different colors.
🌸 I like to land on pretty flowers.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🎵 I make music with my legs.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and I am good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ☘️ Some people think I bring good fortune
⚫ I have dots on my back.

bug.question: I can glow in the dark. What am I?
I make a sticky web to catch other bugs for food. What am I?
I munch on leaves and turn into a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat green plants.
🦋 I change a lot as I grow up.

bug.question: I live in the ground and make tunnels, sometimes I make a big hill. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I help to aerate the soil.

bug.question: I fly around at night and am attracted to light. Sometimes people mistake me for a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 My wings are usually more dull.
